title: Theatre Review: The Hitchhiker’s Guide to The Galaxy - Immersive Experience ★★★⯪☆
summary: You've read the books, listened to the original radio performances, re-read the books, worn the t-shirt - and now it is time to be part of The Hitchhiker’s Guide to The Galaxy.  *Cue the music from Flight of the Sorcerer*  This is a 90-ish minute immersive experience. As well as a full cast of actors and a puppet android, there are ✨celebrity✨ voice cameos.  And songs! So many songs!  Pre Show  …
